articles.author: Ray Sanchez, Mallika Kallingal and Carma Hassan, CNN
articles.title: Ex-police officer Kim Potter weeps, says she's 'sorry' as she recalls fatally shooting Daunte Wright - CNN
articles.description: Former police officer Kim Potter, who has said she mistook her firearm for her Taser when she fatally shot Daunte Wright during a traffic stop near Minneapolis, broke down on the stand Friday --  apologizing and insisting she "didn't want to hurt anybody."
